title: Hattige: or The amours of the king of Tamaran A novel.
author: Brémond, Gabriel de.
publisher: printed for Simon the African, at the Black-Prince in the Sun,
notes: A translation of his: Hattigé, ou, Les amours du roy de Tamaran.
Printer identified by Wing as: R. Bentley.
Caption title on p. 1 reads: Hattige: or, The king of Tameran's amours.
Fictional account of the affair between Charles II and Barbara Villiers, Duchess of Cleveland (Cf. NUC).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
